subject: Re: Bug Bite Thing EDM and promo code
preview: Thank you Joel.  Just received our first order.for this promo  Regards  Shonagh Kelly National Sales Manager Consumer Products The Kelly Company

full_threads.body:
Thank you Joel.

Just received our first order.for this promo

Regards

Shonagh Kelly
National Sales Manager
Consumer Products
The Kelly Company
(Time: 15mins)

Hi Shonagh,

I hope you are doing well.

Confirming we have triggered campaign.

https://mailchi.mp/06dfde0044f4/spring-into-spring-with-50-off-bug-bite-thing-10336512

Here is the screenshot.

Hi Shonagh,

Happy Monday – I hope you had a lovely weekend!

Thanks again for confirming. We’ll be scheduling the EDM to trigger at 10:00 AM, a time we’ve found works really well for engagement and open rates.

Once it’s live, we’ll drop you a note so you know it’s all gone out smoothly.

Hi Joel

Yes, please send
Shonagh Kelly
National Sales Manager
Consumer Products
The Kelly Company

Hi Shonagh,

I hope you are doing well.

Just following up on this one,
Are you able to check the test email? and get your approval to send a blast?

Hi Shonagh,

I hope you’re doing really well!

Here’s a quick look at the updated schedule:
  • Aug 28, 2025 → Activate SAVE50 promo at midnight (Done)
  • Aug 28, 2025 → Reactivate cart calculations (Done)
  • Aug 29, 2025 → Add new homepage banner and Header Banner (Done)
  • Aug 29, 2025 → Send out the email blast (ready to go)

We've sent final test to your email and we are ready to do the email blast.

Hi Shonagh,

I hope you’re doing really well! Best of luck again with your Meta campaign — exciting times ahead.

Here’s a quick look at the updated schedule:
  • Aug 28, 2025 → Activate SAVE50 promo at midnight (Done)
  • Aug 28, 2025 → Reactivate cart calculations (Done)
  • Aug 29, 2025 → Promo goes live (aligned with Meta advertising)
  • Aug 29, 2025 → Send out the email blast
  • Aug 29, 2025 → Add new homepage banner

Tomorrow morning, we’ll just need your help accessing your Mailchimp account, and we’ll also update the email coupon to reflect SAVE50.

Thanks so much for your support — it’s truly appreciated!

Perfect! Thank you so much.

Shonagh

Shonagh Kelly 2 Bonz Place Seven Hills NSW Australia

The Kelly Group PO Box 516 Blacktown NSW 2148

Hi Shonagh,

Yes, we can arrange that so the promo is active from midnight Aug 28, ready to go live on Aug 29 in line with your Meta advertising.

Here’s the updated schedule:

  • Aug 28, 2025 → Activate SAVE50 promo at midnight.
  • Sep 28, 2025 → Reactivate cart calculations.
  • Aug 29, 2025 → Promo live (aligned with Meta advertising).
  • Aug 29, 2025 → Send out the Email Blast.
  • Aug 29, 2025 → Add a new Homepage banner.

Let me know if you’d like us to tweak the email content so it spotlights the SAVE50 promo launch.

Hi Joel

Is there anyway we can have this promo activated midnight August 28 - so its working Aug 29? This date corresponds with our meta advertising.

Shonagh

Hi Shonagh,

Thanks so much for confirming — really appreciate it!

Here’s the updated staging link for you to review: https://stg-bugbiteething-staging.kinsta.cloud/
  • The promo code has been updated to SAVE50 (expires Oct 1, 2025)
  • A new header has been added
  • The homepage banner has been refreshed

Everything should now be in place, but please let me know if you’d like us to adjust anything further (including adding that banner across all pages like last year — happy to set that up).

Hi Joel

I need to change the name of the promo so I know how successful it is this spring.

Please change it to SAVE50

Everything else looks good.

Can we have a banner across the top of the website that stays there no matter what page a customer is viewing?

We did something like that last year.

Shonagh

Hi Shonagh,

Thanks so much for checking it over! I think we’re in a really good spot, but if you’d like us to adjust anything at all, just let me know.

Here’s a quick outline of what’s been done and what’s coming up:
Planned / In Progress
  • Aug 25, 2025 → Add a fresh teaser banner (happy to include this if you’d like).
  • Aug 31, 2025 → Add a new Homepage banner.
  • Sep 1, 2025 → Reactivate the spring50 coupon (currently set to expire Oct 01, 2025, but we can adjust anytime).
  • Sep 1, 2025 → Reactivate the cart calculations.
  • Sep 1, 2025 → Send out the Email Blast.

You can preview everything here: Staging Link

If there’s anything else you’d like to see changed or updated the schedule, just let me know — happy to make adjustments.

Really appreciate your feedback as always!

Looks good Joel

Do you think we need to add anything?

Shonagh Kelly

The Kelly Company
